page.title: 15Clubs and Societies.
page.content: Stainforth is a community through its mining influences.This is reflected in its societies and clubs.The greatest declared interests are in socials, darts,bingo,dominoes and pigeons. Sporting Affiliations include football (Stainforth Juniors),boxing, cricket, judo and a growing interest in golf, following the recent opening of a 9-Hole Golf Course at grid ref.677124 A number of children belong to such groups as the Girls Brigade and St.Johns and the local Youth Club caters for many more. There is an excellent Music Society which uses the school hall and famous musicians give concerts on or accompanied on a fine Blucher piano.
